p: Bulk density was determined according to the method of Narayana and Narasinga-Rao (1984), water absorption capacity (WAC), and water solubility index (WSI) were analyzed according to the method of Sosulski, and McCurdy [ 19] and Oil absorption capacity (OAC) was determined according to the method of Adeleke and Odedeji [ 20]. Foaming capacity (FC) and Foaming stability were examined according to the procedure described by Mittal and Kumar [ 21].
